title: Has Eminem ever had a ghost writer write him some lyrics? If so, what songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: As far as I know, he hasn’t. He is completely, 100%, against musicians that have ghost writers. In his songs Kamikaze, Fall, Lucky You, Not Alike, and The Ringer, he calls out Drake and other artists for having ghost writers. So, not only does Eminem not use ghost writing, but he is strongly against it. (Source: Eminem Airs Out His Issues With Ghostwriting & Mumble Rap On ‘Kamikaze’)
